bio: Ammar Hasayen, CISSP, CISM, Microsoft MVP is a leading expert in cybersecurity and cloud computing with more than fifteen years of experience working with international enterprises. As a cloud security architect, he helps organizations in their cloud migrations by adopting security best practices across the globe. He regularly writes and consults on a variety of technical and security topics and runs blog.ahasayen.com. Ammar recently published a cloud migration handbook available here: http://https://me.ahasayen.com/cloud-migration
